data.title: Rangers - "Initial Thoughts" (Wednesday)
data.meta_description: I have uploaded 77 teams and 33 nations to a 'random selector' website, each day I will ask it to pick 8 teams, so it should throw up different results each...
data.text:
I have uploaded 77 teams and 33 nations to a 'random selector' website, each day I will ask it to pick 8 teams, so it should throw up different results each time.

press the spolier button to see the list of 110 possibilities it can select from

*** GAMEPLAY ***

I will list the 8 clubs / nations selected at random

You need to name a player who has played for Rangers and the other club (actually played for, not just 'been on the books')

If it's a nation the player just needs to be that nationality, they don't need to have had a full cap.

Twist: once you name a player (example Ally McCoist) you cannot use either of those initials again (A or M)

See how many you can get

6 teams = a pass

7 teams = genuinely impressed

All 8 teams = i doubt it's possible but you get massive kudos

*** Here are your 8 teams ***

Arsenal

A Zambian

Dortmund

Bolton

Notts County

Fulham

Livingston

A Canadian
